name: LibreChat
description: Enhanced ChatGPT Clone: Features Agents, DeepSeek, Anthropic, AWS, OpenAI, Assistants API, Azure, Groq, o1, GPT-4o, Mistral, OpenRouter, Vertex AI, Gemini, Artifacts, AI model switching, message search, Code Interpreter, langchain, DALL-E-3, OpenAPI Actions, Functions, Secure Multi-User Auth, Presets, open-source for self-hosting. Provides a UI and experience inspired by ChatGPT with enhanced design and features including multimodal support, speech-to-text, text-to-speech, image generation and editing, code artifacts, web search integration, and support for multiple AI providers and custom endpoints.
short_desc: Enhanced ChatGPT Clone with multi-AI provider support
author: danny-avila
